Functions

MFNVector IMFGetInterpolationPoint (MFAtlas A, IMFFlow F, MFKVector p0, MFAtlas c, double tmax, MFNRegion Omega, MFErrorHandler e)
 Finds a point on the boundary of the current charts in the atlas at which the flow is outward.

Function Documentation

MFNVector IMFGetInterpolationPoint (  MFAtlas  A,
IMFFlow  F,
MFKVector  p0,
MFAtlas  c,
double  tmax,
MFNRegion  Omega,
MFErrorHandler  e
) 
 

Finds a point on the boundary of the current charts in the atlas at which the flow is outward.

Parameters:
A The atlas.
F The flow.
p0 The parameters for the flow.
c The manifold of initial conditions. Points on this have first priority.
tmax The largest time allowed on the manifold.
Omega A region which limits the computation.
e A place to return errors.
Returns:
A new point satisfying the requirements.
